text: What are three things you're grateful for today?
Describe a moment recently when you felt truly at peace.
What is a challenge you're currently facing, and how are you handling it?
Write a letter to your younger self.
What are your top five personal values and why?
Describe your perfect day from start to finish.
Who in your life has had the most positive influence on you, and how?
What fear have you overcome in the past, and what did it teach you?
Where do you see yourself in five years?
What does success mean to you personally?
